text: Shanghai Metro Line 2 is an east-west metro line operated by Shanghai Metro, connecting National Exhibition and Convention Center Station in Qingpu District, Shanghai, China to Pudong Airport Terminal 1&2 Station in Pudong New District. It is 60.56 kilometers long and has 30 stations. It was opened on September 20, 1999. == Station List == Category:Pages with unreviewed translations
title: Shanghai Metro Line 2
